attributes.action: Legislate to help people liv in the areas they are native to
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the influx of incomers to given areas who serve only to push up house prices at the expense of those with history in the area (One example being St Andrews where many rich people retire for the cheap golf they receive with a St Andrews address). This is achievable by building homes that are
actually affordable rather than what the builder classes as such and banning people from owning second homes in the given area as well as giving first refusal on new builds to locals.
